name: Dexter
long_description:
Dexter is the AI process tool for ops teams. We help companies move critical operating processes out of spreadsheets and Slack into reliable automated flows. 

We orchestrate workflows end-to-end, with AI tasks (like filling out online forms, extracting information from images or documents) alongside manual and automated steps. 

For example, Dance, a European mobility company with over 10,000 monthly subscribers, uses us to automate processes like resolving traffic tickets and accidents.
